entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Alberni 7:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. 40 percent chance of showers over southern sections early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
